trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class provides signing functionality.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> proporciona funcionalidad de firma.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class by using a default subject identifier type.
trans-unit.target: El constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> utilizando un tipo de identificador del sujeto predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner> clase tiene los siguientes valores de propiedad predeterminados.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: Valor predeterminado

trans-unit.source: 1.3.14.3.2.26 (szOID_OIWSEC_sha1)
trans-unit.target: 1.3.14.3.2.26 (szOID_OIWSEC_sha1)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.None> if <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A> is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>,
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.None> Si <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A> es <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>,

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.ExcludeRoot> otherwise
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.ExcludeRoot> en caso contrario

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters" /> object that represents the set of CSP parameters to use.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters" /> que representa el conjunto de parámetros de CSP que se van a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class with the specified cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters.
trans-unit.target: El constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters)" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> con los parámetros del proveedor de servicios criptográficos (CSP) especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters)" /> is useful when you know the specific CSP and private key to use for signing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters)" /> es útil cuando se conoce el CSP y la clave privada que se van a usar para firmar.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Para los valores de propiedad predeterminados utilizados con este constructor, vea <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.

trans-unit.source: An exception to those values when this constructor is used is that <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A> is set to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Una excepción a esos valores cuando se utiliza este constructor es que <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the signer identifier type.
trans-unit.target: Miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> que especifica el tipo de identificador del firmante.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class with the specified subject identifier type.
trans-unit.target: El constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType)" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> con el tipo de identificador del sujeto predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que representa el certificado de firma.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class with the specified signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: El constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> con el certificado de firma especificado.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Para los valores de propiedad predeterminados utilizados con este constructor, vea <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.

trans-unit.source: The signing certificate specified by the `certificate` parameter is not checked for validity on input.
trans-unit.target: El certificado de firma especificado por el `certificate` parámetro no se comprueba la validez en la entrada.

trans-unit.source: To validate the certificate prior to supplying it to this constructor, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para validar el certificado antes de suministrar a este constructor, utilice el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the signer identifier type.
trans-unit.target: Miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> que especifica el tipo de identificador del firmante.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que representa el certificado de firma.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> class with the specified signer identifier type and signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: El constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> con el tipo de identificador de firmante y el certificado de firma especificados.

trans-unit.source: The signing certificate specified by the `certificate` parameter is not checked for validity on input.
trans-unit.target: El certificado de firma especificado por el `certificate` parámetro no se comprueba la validez en la entrada.

trans-unit.source: To validate the certificate prior to supplying it to this constructor, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para validar el certificado antes de suministrar a este constructor, utilice el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificate" /> property sets or retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificate" /> establece o recupera el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que representa el certificado de firma.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objeto que representa el certificado de firma.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificates" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> collection that contains certificates associated with the message to be signed.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificates" /> recupera la colección <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> que contiene los certificados asociados al mensaje que se va a firmar.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> collection that represents the collection of certificates associated with the message to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> colección que representa la colección de certificados asociados con el mensaje debe estar firmado.

trans-unit.source: This property may be used to hold certificates in the signer's certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad puede utilizarse para almacenar los certificados en la cadena de certificados del firmante.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the certificates included in the collection are determined by the setting of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, los certificados incluidos en la colección se determinan por el valor de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Not all certificates in the signer's certificate chain are necessarily present in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: No todos los certificados en la cadena de certificados del firmante están necesariamente presentes en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.Certificates%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.DigestAlgorithm" /> property sets or retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> that represents the hash algorithm used with the signature.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.DigestAlgorithm" /> establece o recupera el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> que representa el algoritmo hash utilizado con la firma.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object that represents the hash algorithm used with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> que representa el algoritmo hash utilizado con la firma.

trans-unit.source: For the default value of this property, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Para el valor predeterminado de esta propiedad, vea <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption" /> property sets or retrieves the option that controls whether the root and entire chain associated with the signing certificate are included with the created CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption" /> establece o recupera la opción que controla si la raíz y la cadena completa asociadas al certificado de firma están incluidas con el mensaje CMS/PKCS #7 creado.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption" /> enumeration that specifies how much of the X509 certificate chain should be included in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption" /> que especifica qué parte de la cadena de certificados X509 debe incluirse en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption" /> property can be one of the following <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption" /> members.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption" /> puede ser uno de los siguientes miembros de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption" />.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Name
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Nombre

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Value
trans-unit.target: </term><description> Valor

trans-unit.source: </description><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </description><description> Significado

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.None" /></term><description> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.None" /></term><description> 0

trans-unit.source: </description><description> The certificate chain is not included.
trans-unit.target: </description><description> No se incluye la cadena de certificados.

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.ExcludeRoot" /></term><description> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.ExcludeRoot" /></term><description> 1

trans-unit.source: </description><description> The certificate chain, except for the root certificate, is included.
trans-unit.target: </description><description> La cadena de certificados, excepto el certificado raíz, se incluye.

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.EndCertOnly" /></term><description> 2
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.EndCertOnly" /></term><description> 2

trans-unit.source: </description><description> Only the end certificate is included.
trans-unit.target: </description><description> Solo se incluye el certificado final.

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.WholeChain" /></term><description> 3
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption.WholeChain" /></term><description> 3

trans-unit.source: </description><description> The certificate chain, including the root certificate, is included.
trans-unit.target: </description><description> La cadena de certificados, incluido el certificado raíz, se incluye.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los argumentos proporcionados a un método no era válido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection of signed attributes to be associated with the resulting <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> content.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes" /> recupera la colección <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> de atributos firmados que se va a asociar al contenido <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> resultante.

trans-unit.source: Signed attributes are signed along with the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Los atributos firmados se firman junto con el contenido especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection that represents the signed attributes.
trans-unit.target: Colección <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> que representa los atributos firmados.

trans-unit.source: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Si no existen atributos firmados, la propiedad es una colección vacía.

trans-unit.source: An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> collection retrieved by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A> property is the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> signing time attribute.
trans-unit.target: Un ejemplo de atributo firmado que podría incluirse en la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> recuperar la colección por el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A> propiedad es el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> firma de atributos de tiempo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> object and a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the corresponding signer whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A> property is not empty.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> objeto y un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> objeto se genera automáticamente y se coloca en el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad del firmante correspondiente siempre que la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A> propiedad no está vacía.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType" /> property sets or retrieves the type of the identifier of the signer.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType" /> establece o recupera el tipo del identificador del firmante.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> que especifica el tipo del identificador del firmante.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los argumentos proporcionados a un método no era válido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.UnsignedAttributes" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection of unsigned PKCS #9 attributes to be associated with the resulting <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> content.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.UnsignedAttributes" /> recupera la colección <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> de atributos PKCS #9 no firmados que se va a asociar al contenido <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> resultante.

trans-unit.source: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.
trans-unit.target: Los atributos no firmados se pueden modificar sin invalidar la firma.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection that represents the unsigned attributes.
trans-unit.target: Colección <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> que representa los atributos no firmados.

trans-unit.source: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Si no existen atributos no firmados, la propiedad es una colección vacía.

trans-unit.source: An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> collection retrieved by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.UnsignedAttributes%2A> property is a countersignature.
trans-unit.target: Un ejemplo de un atributo sin signo que puede incluirse en la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> recuperar la colección por el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.UnsignedAttributes%2A> propiedad es una contrafirma.
